text: Everybody saying this has been a bad generation for JRPG's are looking in the wrong spot.  All the good JRPG's moved to handhelds. text: Seems like most new, possibly different games are being shunned for the franchises that make the most money, hence why E3 was immensely boring, save for a few games, all of which are completely original (The Last of Us, Watch_Dogs, Dishonored).
